item.title: React freshness
item.description: In the javascript community, some people have experienced javascript fatigue. For me, this fatigue is two folds. First, you need to keep up to date with the frantic pace of redux, react-router and friends and make sure you will be able to migrate your code to the new major versions. Second, Webpack configuration is not always straight-forward. I know a lot of people that really want to see what React is like and play with it without having to cope with a lot of configuration up-front.
